metadata.title: CVE-2017-6503 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
WebUI in qBittorrent before 3.3.11 did not escape many values, which could potentially lead to XSS.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-6503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

qbittorrent - 4.0.3-1
qbittorrent-nox - 4.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qbittorrent package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-1').
